short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: change your website from dark mood to light mode and vice versa! ಥ_ಥ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you use dark mode or light mode for every site except 2-3 sites that google manages. You should Install this because its a quicker way to apply the mode you want to use and it works on sites that do not have a dark mode!
